response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering this, I am extending a special offer to you to acquire this product at the exclusive price of $18,000. This is an opportunity to secure a premium item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
